values:
Fandoms.  Are hilarious.
Take for example:

"Hotaru Sailor Saturn from Sailor Moon is the blood child of Voldemort. She is raised with Harry and is ignorant of her heritage. She will soon find what amazing things are meant for her as well as face off against the other Sailor Scouts."

What?

I'm bored. SO: Go to Wikipedia, and click on a random article. This is your band name. Click it again, this is your album name. Click it fifteen more times, and these are your track names. Band Name: Crowds Album Name: East Dean Rural District 1. Coatascorn 2. George Whitfield Chadwick 3. Caddo Public Schools (Louisiana) 4. Infinite Monkey Theorem 5. South Crest School 6. Poison Oak 7. Unicameral Youth Conference 8. 1893 U.S. National Championships (tennis) 9. George Washington Wright 10. Credenza 11. Henry Odera Oruka 12. William Wetmore Story 13. Feasibility Condition 14. Alka Vuica 15. Eric Rogers (Conductor and Composer) I think "Infinite Monkey Theorem" and "1893 U.S. National Championships (tennis)" would be the best songs off my album if I were to make one. :D

Hmm. I was writing something for a friend the other day, and I just happened to think, "Whatever did happen to my writings?" I used to be so into writing little snippets, and poetry. I never thought I was any good, but looking through my dA gallery, I wasn't so bad. I thought I'd share something. [I'm sure you remember this, Cotume, and a few of you have read this on my dA.] Don't leave, dear sister in her time of need, of great grievances and oppression. For there is a world far greater than us that has to be fed with love. Tenderness cannot conceive that black hole churning ferociously in the sky, but passionate compassion may. The burning desire is in her eyes, look through them and see what she needs. Her soul, it holds the emotions of millions. The mass of a billion is but entangled in her lengthy hair and encrusted mouth. Don't leave, dear sister in the time of greed, tremendous downfalls and depression. There is but more to be discovered. Through those frail hands, the hour will slip, and through those thin lips, the lies will grip reality. Unbeknownst to your ears, the wind from her mouth whistles with fortune and disgrace. Do stay and see the misfortunes unfold. Don't leave, dear sister in the dark of day, when she needs you most. Let her be heard, let her words be uttered before you. See her through her blight, and unravel the cloth shrouded in front of her eyes. Let her be known, and revealed to the world. Don't leave, dear sister. Don't leave. Now, keep in mind, I do not claim to be the best writer, and I was 14 when I wrote this. I don't even know my grammar all too well, so if there are a lot of grammar mistakes, I'm sorry. I'm not perfect. But I hope you liked it anyways. :)

This is a lame art post. But I like some of the graffiti that I've done on Facebook, so I thought I'd show you guys. :D
Oldest to Newest. I drew this for Jimmy, and this was one of the very first ones that I actually liked. :D This was for Jordan. I like drawing inverted[ly]...>_> Another one for Jimmy after he changed accounts. And one of the few times I've been able to color red hair right. For Taylor. I forget to draw eyebrows from time to time. For Natalia, and one of my favorites of all times. Doesn't look too bad without eyebrows. For Jules after I drew him a crappy "Harry Potter" for his birthday. I like how he/she has Jaundice. For Tiia. I tried to use Christmas colors. I think it would've worked out better with green eyes and red hair. :D For Natalia. This is why I don't do landscapes/waterscapes. Also because I don't quite try on them. Another for Tiia, and this time I actually tried to color with the colors inverted without reference. I failed. :D For Charlotte. It took me a long time to do. D: And one of my absolute favorites. >3 Well...okay...this isn't from Graffiti, but I just wanted to put it. D:< I recently got Painter IX and I wanted to test it out. This was done using the Conte Crayon tool. I loooove it. I emulated how I color pictures on Graffiti, so yeah. I like how colorful the hair is. And since this was test of Painter itself, I didn't care about the proportions and if the drawing actually looked good. So bite me. D:<
There you go. Hope you enjoyed. It was fairly long.

I'm probably never going to finish this...so I'll post it as is. :) Art by Catzilla, coloring by me. This is the 100% version, by the way. There's something satisfying about coloring hair with the 1 px pencil tool. Hope you liked! :D

There's not much, and it's not even all that great, but whatever. I like 'em. :D So way back when, when I was taking Drivers Ed, I was so bored of doing DE stuff all day long that I would open up Paint and start drawing in it. And I learned that I really like drawing in Paint. So, since then, I've been drawing on Paint whenever I couldn't draw on paper. :3 This the first picture I've done on Paint [since DE]. I really like this one the most. The hair and the skin shading are just awesome in my opinion. :D And also I like it the most because after this, the quality in coloring things other than hair deteriorates. ^^" I was just drawing this to test out hair. I really like the sketchy and scrapiness of it all. And the hair = awesome. I don't give a rat's ass about how ugly the face is. :) This was an experimentation in perspective that I never quite finished. I like unnaturally colored hair! ;D And that's it. Hope you all liked. I'm probably going to have more in the future. :)

I'm totally intruding upon Taylor's craft, but gosh. Jewelry making is so fun! :o I've been meaning to try it for a while, and I have in the past, unsuccessfully mind you, and I finally got around to doing it successfully yesterday. XD So far, I've only made two pairs of earrings and one choker.
These are my first pair of earrings ever. And my first jewelry piece. :) I screwed up on them though. D: As should be expected. I'm totally in love with these. :) I like the bead arrangement. ;)
 I need to go get some more beads soon. :o Hope you like. I just thought you'd like to know that I'm addicted to the song "All Day Long I Dream About Sex" by JC Chasez. It's so catchy and addictive. Except for that little techno music interlude. That's just weird. o_O Also: I feel proud. Because I got two full-body CG commissions for someone on Gaia done in under one day. BAM.

So we've all heard about Wikipedia and its impetuous prank editing. I never thought I would see one. Until today. I was bored out of my mind after completing all the modules in Drivers Ed, right? So I head on over to the Today in History section. And guess what I find?
This.
I showed Carol and Jane, and we got a real good kick out of it. I went back an hour later to see if it was still there, and unfortunately, it wasn't. But this was definitely the highlight of my day. I hope you enjoy. :)

Soooooooooo...I started working on the story version of my script.  Yay.  I learned that I like my style of writing in first person.  But I can't write worth shit when it comes to third person.

Anyone who's experienced in writing stories willing to help me out?  And anyone who isn't?  I'll take any advice that you throw my way.  D:

I'm not a writer by any means, but I'm trying.  I'd really like this to be successful.
And I'd love to share it on dA when the time comes.

I'm a visual artist.  Not a writer.  [As I too often tell my mother.]  So I'd like advice.

:)

Stolen from Cotume! I want to have a complete soundtrack with one song from each of my friends. I'm going to upload them to my iPod and make a "F-List Soundtrack" playlist with notes of what songs belongs to who. Pick one song (or more if you want) you want me to associate with you, then comment and send it to me (via YouSendIt or MegaUpload, for example). It can be your favorite song in the whole world, a recent favorite or just a song that you think really identifies you. Even if you can't upload the song, leave a comment just telling me what it would be and what that song means to you.

I have just had one of the best days in a long while. It started off with me actually arriving to school on time. Then Kasey informing me that she'd like to use one of my photograph's for the cover of our school's literary magazine, Stone Soup. I also found out I had a hole in the crotch of my pants. Which gave everyone a good laugh. XD And then I just came back from Kinko's where I didn't have to pay for anything. They enlarged the photo, made a print and saved it on the flash drive for no charge. :o I also got a Pepsi on the way home, and I've been dying without it. I have a really bad addiction to Pepsi. I can't go a week without it. :( I also got a really funny letter from the Navy today. I'm just gonna type excerpts of it here: "Dear Qurat, For you, high school is almost over. And you have some big decisions to make. College, work, or will you have to juggle both to get where you want to go? Where's the adventure in that? We should talk. There are ways I can help you gain valuable hands-on experience. [...] This is your opportunity to make something of your life - something extremely cool. For every time someone said you couldn't do it. Or that you don't have what it takes. Prove them wrong. In the Navy. [...]There's no pressure or obligation. Just the chance for us to help you live the life you've dreamed of. The Navy." Wow. That was taken word for word from the letter. Including all the bolded statements. This is the funniest letter I've gotten so far. [And to Jake: I don't care how ugly you think he is. He smiled at me today. D:<] I hope everyone's day was as good. Was it? How have you all been lately? Have you done anything exciting?

*Gets shot*  I'm sorry I'm posting so much!  D:

But my brother just gave us a his not-old LCD monitor.  And it makes everything gorgeous.  He also gave his old keyboard.  And it works so nicely!  D:  OMFG.  I love it.  It's so beautiful!

And if you haven't commented on the WIP, please do so!
Crap.  We didn't have school or exams today, did we?  For some reason I've been having this irrational fear that I've missed school or my Eng. exam today.  D:

OMFG dA. D: Ok, I wanted to submit this on dA first, but dA is being stupid! OK. So. This is based off 'See You on the Other Side' by BT. It's a picture that I would really like to work on and make my best. But I can't do this without your help! So if you would, please leave as much criticism and commentary as you can in this entry about the picture. I really want this picture to be the best it can be! Especially since I'm considering submitting it to ELO. And if you would answer these questions along with the criticism/commentary I'd really appreciate it: 1.] Realistically speaking, does the neck look too thick? 2.] Should I add an arm? [XD I know, a very 'WTF?!' question] 3.] Should I color this it all? And if so, should I do it digitally? 4.] Do the ear and the eye look okay? 5.] Should I submit it to ELO?

<lj-cut>
<font size="24">OMFG IT IS SNOWING.  AND I HAVE A SNOW DAY.</font>
</lj-cut>

So this means no APUSH exam or Printing Graphics exam!  Wheeeeee~

And ummm..This keyboard is totally dead now.  I can't type the following:  h, j, u, <, >, the right shift button, or obviously the comma, since the comma is underneath the '<' key.  D:<  Sucks.

Sorry for the onslaught of entries [for those of you who can see them]! But this is the last one for today. :) This is for my absolutely bestest friend, TIIA! :D Way back in the summer she requested that I make her a birthday picture of a cute girl. And...so I did. Just a couple of days ago. ^^; So Tiia, I really hope you like the picture, despite all the mistakes. :) I love you! Now if you don't mind, I'm gonna go and dance around my house lip-syncing cheesy pop songs. :)

I just thought you all would like to know that I just got my first 100 on a webassign.  It was 102 questions long.  D:  And it's not even due until tomorrow.  Aw snap.

I was so tired today.  I guess this teaches me not to put off really long papers.  D:

I'm addicted to Gaia.  If you have an account, add me.  My username's IvySan.  Same as dA.  You can normally catch me hunting for gold and trash or pranking people in Towns.  :)

Letter Meme Comment and I'll give you a letter; then you have to list 10 things you love that begin with that letter. After, post this in your journal, and give out some letters of your own. Let me know if you want a letter. Tiia gave me the letter "L". L: Who doesn't love L from Death Note? He probably has to be my favorite character. Lift Me Up: By Moby. It's such a wonderful song. Life: Sure I complain about it a lot, but I still love it no matter what. It's so exciting. Love: Without it, I'd be pretty devoid of emotions. Languages: I mean the foreign kind. I love learning different languages. Learning: I have a severe thirst for knowledge of any subject. Even USH as much as I dislike it. Literature: I really like reading literature. D: Especially things by Mark Twain! :D Luck: And I have plenty of it too. :) LAWLZ: Only the best mock exclamation EVAR. Well..next to EVAR. :D LiveJournal: It's where all my angst goes! XD Haha, such a cop-out answer. :P

You know what's absolutely sexy? Firefox 2. It owns. I love it so much. I've got a media player in my Fox! :D And it's got a built-in SPELLCHECK. [Not that I need one.] Step 1: Put your iTunes or equivalent on random. Step 2: Post the first line from the first 30 songs that play, no matter how embarassing. Step 3: Bold out the songs when someone guesses correctly. Step 4: Looking them up on Google or any other search engine is CHEATING! THIS IS JUST THE FIRST FIFTEEN. 1.] Road trippin' with my two favorite allies Fully loaded we got snacks and supplies 2.] Holiday, Get away. I feel Funny. Children's money 3.] I won't try to dent you right or stop your flight I've known our plight You know I'm right 4.] Psychic spies from China Try to steal your mind's elation 5.] She's the one she's the only one She's got ripped back light 6.] This is dangerous Open up your head feel the shell-shock 7.] Well I got a bad disease, Up from my brain is where I bleed 8.] I see myself in the pouring home I see the light come over now 9.] Dil samundar dil mera dil samundar ho aa dubadu tujko dilbar [Yeah...it's Hindi. I doubt you know this.] 10.] When my honey come back, sometimes I wanna rap that jack, sometimes 11.] Look I'm standing naked before you Don't you want more than my sex? Leather by Tori Amos 12.] My secret wish In this sacred place Is to relinquish needs 13.] Wind me up Put me down Start me off and watch me go 14.] Everything inside of me Is burning up for you to see 15.] My shadow side, so amplified, Keeps coming back dissatisfied I should probably get started on my homework. D: Julie and Cassity are awesome. Interviews are fun to do. ;D BANANAMAN.

Umm...I don't feel like going through that submission process on dA right now. Mainly because it's not working for me. Soooo...I'll just post this here. :) This was a request one of my friend's made. She requested I draw Sirius Black. Soo...I did. I didn't want to just stop at him, so I drew a black dog to represent his animagus form. Apparently she requests all her friends draw her something so she can hang up their drawings on her wall of art. I was happy to oblige. :D I had a lot of fun working with traditionals on this. And I really liked it. Obviously, she has the original copy, so I was kinda sad to give up something I liked. But oh well. :) Picture Specifications [if you care]: Umm...I used many different pens to line. I think a bold Faber-Castell pen, .7, .5, .25, .35, .005, .01, and a fine-tip sharpie just for the lineart. The coloring was done with a bunch of different colored pencils I have lying around, nothing fancy, Crayola 24-pack crayons, black RoseArt marker, and two dying grey markers. And colored ballpoint pens. Feel free to interpret the picture however you want. :]

Every artist on dA has to have a rant about popularity. This is mine. Keep in mind that these are my opinions, and you're allowed to have yours. :) Why do pageviews and statistics rule everything on dA? Don't answer that, it's not meant to be answered. I mean honestly, everywhere I turn I see people bitching and complaining about: "Oh! Look at me, I can draw as well as this person, and they have n,million amount of pageviews, and I only have n,thousand! LIFE SUCKS!" Or: "I am so sick of all the popular artists ruling the front page! Give us a chance! You all suck anyways!" I could give more examples, and as much I'd love to, I have to move on to my point. I wish people would stop using pageviews as a merit badge on how talented you are. They mean nothing. For fucks sake, get over yourselves. If you love art, pageviews and favorites should have no ruling over it. You do art for yourself, and not the fame, right? If you honestly feel like pagevies matter, and you're not getting the pageviews you truly deserve, then stop and take a look at your art. Look and see if you can actually, and truly draw. Can you do anatomy, and proportions really well? Do you draw a lot of different poses? Do you experiment in the same medium a lot? Do you have something that will catch peoples' eyes? Or is your art just as generic and redundant as the other person complaining about the same thing? Could it be that you're just jealous, and using your complaining techniques as a ploy to get more hits? Fucking hell. Why does popularity matter so much?! I know that this shouldn't get to me, since it's all on a website, but it does. People should do art for the sake of art, not for who's watching you, and who's favoriting your stuff. What should matter is why they're watching you. But hey, I can't tell you why you should do art, or what for. I'm not you. But moving on, popularity is greatly rendered by what's in your gallery. If it's original, or fan-based. Is your original stuff really what's most favorited in your gallery? Or is it some half-assed fanart? If it's the fanart piece, why are you complaining? You drew it, and you knew it would happen. dA members love to gobble up fanart. Everyone knows that. But hey, if you actually want to work for your fame, then improve your drawing method, keep doing original stuff, and do it because you want to. If you want to sell out, and want a free ride to the top, then change your style to some uber-cute-big-eyed anime technique, and make sure to draw a lot of Naruto fanart. Don't forget yaoi, as the conventional term may be. And another thing! Stop bitching at some of the top artists for their fame. Some of them didn't ask for it. Yeah sure a lot of them got to be where they are today through fanart and stuff, but sometimes look at the quality of the piece. It's not all, "OH! NARUTO! *FAVES*" There is actual effort put in there. SOMETIMES. And have you noticed that some of them have actually been long term members? Yeah, you can't expect to be famous overnight. Also, a lot of them have been going at their art for a long time! They've tried a lot of different mechanisms and have found a style that's stuck with them. THEY'VE ACTUALLY TRIED THINGS THAT FURTHER THEM. Besides, fame isn't all that nice. It gets tiring after a while, I bet. You get people like the one's mentioned above bitching at you for being where you are. You get flamed, you get accused of stealing art. It's not all unicorns and rainbows. :) Of course, I wouldn't know this. And I'm fine with that. *Disclaimer: I'm not sorry if you're offended by this. If you draw fanart because you want to, and you don't mind where it ranks in your gallery, good for you. I'm complaining against the people who complain about it. Also, if it sounds like I'm bashing the popular kids on dA, I am, and I'm not at the same time. I'm sticking up for the people who worked hard to get there. And I'm not sticking up for the people who's whole gallery is filled with what people want to see. I love how the song title kinda fits. We're human, and it's human nature is the answer to cop out with. This is long. Good night.

XD I said this was for art, and I meant it. I never said it was for good art. :) Haha, I'm copping out on you guys, but I'm busy busy this weekend, so I don't have much time to talk! I'll have a full explanation of what I did this weekend Sundayish. Just right click on the picture and "view image," if you can't see it. This is Danni in my newer style. :) Danni would be the main character of my yet-to-be-but-very-muchly-hyped manga. I should not have done the lines in grey. It makes the picture look more faded than it should. And I tried coloring in the hair and eyes, and it just looked horrible. D: I liked the skin shading, as basic as it may be. I have the b&w version up because it seems to blend into the other colors a little less obviously. Maybe because I made Danni's skin too orange. Oh well. She's supposed to be naturally tan. ^^; Also, the new layout is up on iBackgrounds

So, that layout...I'm getting lazy on it. XD Coding is so much more extraneous than I remember it to be. :P I'm too lazy to go around Photoshop and pick up colors. D: Today was a roller coaster. It started out bad, turned good, went okay in the end. Bad because, I woke up, ate, started fasting, took a shower, accidentally went to sleep for an hour, woke up at 7:30, was out of the house by 7:45 when I should've been out at 6:20, and got to school at 8, and missed a Chem. test. Made it up during lunch though. Good because I've realized that the number of people that I truly love, and like, far outnumber the people I hate. There are some people that are just enigmas, and I feel myself pulled to. Okay, because I was tired and lost my vigor. Although, I did regain it while I was pchatting with Cotume, and Bulblady. XD OMG...that was the most crazy, psychadelic thing I've experienced all day. :) Japanese was interesting. We learned how to say the incorrect and creepy version of "Would you like to come over to my house?" You had to be there to get it. :D I've also learned today that Carl Jung was one of the greatest men alive. I never thought I would ever learn about someone I would come to love more than Freud. Too bad their friendship ended in tragedy. Jung...I can't wait to learn more about him. He makes me giddy, and want to learn more with a fervor. [You know you love the career you want to go into when you can't help but tell everyone how amazing one of the pioneers in that field was.] And I'm almost officially in Key Club. :) I've got ten hours, and the eight hour deadline is this Saturday. XD I just need to pay my dues, and get inducted. Also, I stole this from Cotume:

Another fun meme brought to you by rfreebern.

Don't worry about being on that list, guys. Not many of you are. :\ Sorry to make everyone so paranoid. I don't feel like that often. Just when my friends get to be too much to handle. Not many of you are like that. There are very few people that I actually dislike. I'm sorry to cause so much trouble. It's good to know that you guys are willing to go out of your way to make me feel comfortable, but you don't need to. It's really not necessary. I'd rather have your original qualities, the way you normally are, than you rather see me, and go, "Oh. Here come's Qurat, time to put a mask on and make her happy." So, onto more pressing matters: [Warning, huge nerdy obsession up ahead.] iBackgrounds's [my main website] 2nd birthday just passed by on the 24th. Of September. >_> Soooo...to celebrate, I'm makin' a new layout! And it's looking spankin'. :D Like seriously. It looks so good. It's so pretty. :) Take a look for yourselves:
Preview
I wanted to go for a more autumn/Gryffindor feel. I'm not even halfway done yet. D: I still have some touch-ups to do, and then the coding is the other half. :P I think I went a bit overboard with the textures, but too bad. XD It looks pretty. :) Also, compared to the current layout up, it looks a lot better. Compare Oh man, I cannot wait to code this! XD I've spent two hours on it all together so far. The screencap shows the second version, with only four layers. The original has about 15 or more. It's a good waste of my time, in my opinion. Oh! I also have an oekaki board for my art site now. :D You can visit the O. Board here. The link should work. :)

D: Okay, okay! So I caved and got an lj. Only because my Xanga isn't working! >=) But eh...I might update this often too. Maybe with art? Eeeeey.

Oh man, yesterday was I busy! I didn't get one minute on the compy. D: Darn'd community service. Oh well. :3

Umm..I guess that's it for now. Until I figure out how to work this thing. Anybody wanna teach me? ^^;

Oh hey! My Xanga's working again. Oh well. I like lj. :P

Sorry I stole the band name, Jake. :(
